column4: if I want to install ubuntu, what iso file do i have to download? http://nl.releases.ubuntu.com/6.06/
if you download the desktop CD (so you can try ubuntu without installing), can you still install with the same .iso afterwards?
you can install right from the LiveCD session
when you're running the liveCD, there's an "Install" icon on the desktop; that will do the install - including partitioning- for you
